Name: Automatic Nepali Number-Plate Recognition
Description: It is a Nepali Number-Plate Recognition System. It is a part of my Third Year Project.

Name: Nepali Speech Recognition and Summarization
Description: It is an speech transcription and summarization system for Nepali Language. It is a part of my Final Year Project.

Name: Tic-Tac-Toe using Minimax Algorithm
Description: It is an optimal tic-tac-toe AI built on python.

Name: Single Purpose Neural Network from Scratch
Description: It is simple implementation of Layered architecture of Neural Network from Scratch using python. It is designed to find path in a simple 2d game.

Name: Skin Disease Detection using Deep Learning
Description: It is a skin disease classification system that can be useful for dermatologists. It is a hackathon project made in 2 days.

Name: Movie recomendation system using K-Means Clustering
Description: It is a simple project done as a lab work for Data Mining course. It is a movie recomendation system using K-Means Clustering
